title: HortPark: Nature Playgarden and Therapeutic Garden

HortPark offers various venues for booking, suitable for organized tours and group activities. Vineyard restaurant is also located within the park. It's a family-friendly environment where children can engage in open-ended play and exercise their creativity.

title: Nature-Inspired Playground at 264 Jurong Street 24
blurb: Smiles Around Every Corner
description: Nestled in the heart of Jurong East, 264 Jurong East Street 24 is a charming nature-inspired playground that brings the magic of the outdoors right into the neighbourhood. This beautifully crafted space combines play, imagination, and nature in one inviting spot. A central treehouse structure stands proudly amidst lush greenery, surrounded by slides, rope climbers, balancing beams, and interactive play panels that spark curiosity and adventure. Children can scale nets, spin, bounce on the tortoise spring rider, or explore hidden corners that encourage creative play, while parents can unwind nearby under the shade. Every detail is thoughtfully designed to blend fun with safety, giving kids the freedom to move, imagine, and grow in a natural, open-air setting. Whether it’s a weekend outing or an everyday escape after school, this playground transforms ordinary playtime into a woodland adventure — a place where laughter echoes, friendships bloom, and nature’s calm meets the joy of discovery.

Egg Splash is a water park located in Bird Paradise.

title: Splash at Shangri-La
blurb: Play venue at Shangri-La
description: Make a splash at Splash @ Shangri-La Singapore, the ultimate water play paradise for families. Spanning over 1,300 square metres, this vibrant water playground is packed with fun for kids of all ages — and relaxation for parents too. The centrepiece is a whimsical pirate ship complete with slides, water cannons, and tipping buckets that send waves of excitement across the play zone. Around it, little adventurers can race down slides, weave through water jets, and float lazily along the mini river, while toddlers enjoy gentle wading pools designed with safety and exploration in mind. Every detail, from the soft flooring to the shaded rest zones, ensures that playtime is as safe as it is exciting. Surrounded by lush tropical greenery, Splash feels like a private resort adventure right in the city — where parents can unwind on sun loungers while keeping an eye on their young explorers. Families can also pair their water play with access to buds by Shangri-La, the hotel’s indoor play haven, for a full day of excitement and creativity. With its thoughtfully designed play areas, friendly lifeguards, and welcoming atmosphere, Splash @ Shangri-La transforms ordinary weekends into unforgettable family memories. Whether you’re staying at the hotel or visiting for a day pass, this urban oasis promises laughter, bonding, and the kind of fun that keeps kids happily splashing for hours.
price_display: Free 1 playtime session per night of stay
